body:
While trying to install py-ipython for python@3.6.5,
I get the following error:



```console
$ spack install py-ipython       ^python@3.6.5
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    python@3.6.5
        ^bzip2
        ^ncurses
            ^pkgconfig
        ^openssl
            ^zlib
        ^readline
        ^sqlite


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    py-backports-shutil-get-terminal-size


py-backports-shutil-get-terminal-size requires python version :3.2, but spec asked for 3.6.5

...
```

This has been obtained on CentOS7 with spack 0.11.2
title: py-ipython : An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:
